titles.title: Empowering States to Address Drug Costs Act
Empowering States to Address Drug Costs Act
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to expand the permitted uses of drug price information disclosed to States under the Medicaid drug rebate program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Empowering States to Address Drug Costs Act
This bill expands the purposes for which states may use certain drug pricing information that is disclosed to them by manufacturers through the Medicaid Drug Rebate Program. Specifically, the bill allows states to use such information in furtherance of prescription drug affordability boards or state multi-payer purchasing pools.
